content: My friend, amazing article. So glad to know that other humans are suffering issue #9 and it’s not the world that is messing with me because of some kind of awkward version of my mac. Some new issues Alex Kukharenko: Issue #1: Giving thickness only at one border of a shape! Does anybody struggle with this?Here I found the hack to solve it. Issue #2: Can’t access the colour palette from the Gradient fill! I can’t see my colour palette when I am creating a new gradient!
